natural solution: We note that $\sqrt{9 \cdot 9^t} = 3 \cdot 3^t$. The equation becomes: \begin{align} 3 \cdot 3^t + 3 \cdot 3^t &= 18\\ \Rightarrow 6 \cdot 3^t &= 18 \\ \Rightarrow 3^t &= 3. \end{align}Therefore, $t = \boxed{1}$.
